languages.text: "Вы могли бы меня понять. То, как вам удалось раскрыть мои планы перед судом, подтверждает ваш {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}незаурядный интеллект{/d}. Но он отравлен эгоизмом, и оттого мне еще мучительнее проигрывать эту битву умов за власть".

"You might have understood my perspective. The way you managed to expose my plans before the trial confirms your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}extraordinary intelligence{/d}. But it is poisoned by your self-interest, which makes it all the more painful for me to lose this battle of wits for power."
languages.original_text: "Вы могли бы меня понять. То, как вам удалось раскрыть мои планы перед судом, подтверждает ваш {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}незаурядный интеллект{/d}. Но он отравлен эгоизмом, и оттого мне еще мучительнее проигрывать эту битву умов за власть".

But it is poisoned by your self-interest, which makes it all the more painful for me to lose this battle of wits for power."

languages.text: 「君なら私の観点を理解してくれたかもしれない。君が私の計画を法廷で暴露したやり方は、君の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}並外れた知性{/d}を証明している。だが、それは君が私利私欲にまみれ、この権力を巡る知恵比べで負けることを一層辛いものにしている」
languages.original_text: "You might have understood my perspective. The way you managed to expose my plans before the trial confirms your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}extraordinary intelligence{/d}. But it is poisoned by your self-interest, which makes it all the more painful for me to lose this battle of wits for power."

「君なら私の観点を理解してくれたかもしれない。君が私の計画を法廷で暴露したやり方は、君の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}並外れた知性{/d}を証明している。だが、それは君が私利私欲にまみれ、この権力を巡る知恵比べで負けることを一層辛いものにしている」

languages.text: "Ihr habt möglicherweise meine Sichtweise verstanden. Wie Ihr meine Pläne vor dem Prozess offengelegt habt, bestätigt Eure {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}außergewöhnliche Intelligenz{/d}. Aber sie ist durch Euren Egoismus vergiftet, was es für mich noch schmerzhafter macht, diesen geistigen Wettstreit um die Macht verloren zu haben."
languages.original_text: "You might have understood my perspective. The way you managed to expose my plans before the trial confirms your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}extraordinary intelligence{/d}. But it is poisoned by your self-interest, which makes it all the more painful for me to lose this battle of wits for power."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt möglicherweise meine Sichtweise verstanden. Wie Ihr meine Pläne vor dem Prozess offengelegt habt, bestätigt Eure {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}außergewöhnliche Intelligenz{/d}. languages.text: "Bakış açımı kavramış olabilirsin. Mahkeme öncesinde planlarımı ortaya serme biçimin, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}olağanüstü zekânın{/d} delilidir. Fakat bencilliğin o zekâyı zehirlemiş. Kudret uğruna girdiğim bu zihin savaşını kaybetmek, işte bu yüzden canımı daha çok yakıyor."
languages.original_text: "You might have understood my perspective. The way you managed to expose my plans before the trial confirms your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}extraordinary intelligence{/d}. But it is poisoned by your self-interest, which makes it all the more painful for me to lose this battle of wits for power."

Fakat bencilliğin o zekâyı zehirlemiş. Kudret uğruna girdiğim bu zihin savaşını kaybetmek, işte bu yüzden canımı daha çok yakıyor."

"Bakış açımı kavramış olabilirsin. Mahkemede planlarımı ortaya serme biçimin, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}olağanüstü zekâna{/d} delildir. Fakat bencilliğin o zekâyı zehirlemiş. Kudret uğruna girdiğim bu zihin savaşını kaybetmek işte bu yüzden canımı daha çok yakıyor."

languages.text: «Podría haber entendido mi perspectiva. Su forma de exponer mis planes antes del juicio deja clara su {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}prodigiosa inteligencia{/d}. Pero está contaminada por su interés propio, lo que hace que perder esta batalla de ingenio por el poder sea más doloroso aún».
languages.original_text: "You might have understood my perspective. The way you managed to expose my plans before the trial confirms your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}extraordinary intelligence{/d}. But it is poisoned by your self-interest, which makes it all the more painful for me to lose this battle of wits for power."

traits.locale_text: «Podría haber entendido mi perspectiva. Su forma de exponer mis planes antes del juicio deja clara su {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}prodigiosa inteligencia{/d}. Pero está contaminada por su interés propio, lo que hace que perder esta batalla de ingenio por el poder sea más doloroso aún».

languages.text: “或许你已经理解了我的观点。你在审判结束前当众拆穿了我的计划，证明了你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}超乎常人的智谋{/d}。不过，你的一己私欲却玷污了它。正因如此，我在这场智慧与权力的斗争中落败，才会让我感到更加痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "You might have understood my perspective. The way you managed to expose my plans before the trial confirms your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}extraordinary intelligence{/d}. But it is poisoned by your self-interest, which makes it all the more painful for me to lose this battle of wits for power."

traits.locale_text: “或许你已经理解了我的观点。你在审判结束前当众拆穿了我的计划，证明了你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}超乎常人的智谋{/d}。不过，你的一己私欲却玷污了它。正因如此，我在这场智慧与权力的斗争中落败，才会让我感到更加痛苦。”
“或许你已经理解了我的观点。你在这场审判中当众拆穿了我的计划，证明了你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}超乎常人的机智{/d}。不过，你的一己私欲却玷污了它。正因如此，我在这场智慧与权力的斗争中落败，才会让我感到更加痛苦。”

languages.text: « Vous avez peut-être compris mon point de vue. La méthode que vous avez employée pour dévoiler mes plans lors du procès confirme votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}extraordinaire intelligence{/d}. Mais elle est parasitée par vos propres intérêts, ce qui rend mon échec d'autant plus douloureux. »
